attributes.additional_details:
Thomas Morrison repeatedly sexually attacked a 9 year old girl on Christmas day, in the same room as her young brother. Plead not guilty, And made the young girl relive the ordeal by giving evidence.

Hes probably ruined Christmas  for the young girl for the rest of her life. And he's given a Community Payback Order.

Please sign if you think he should be recalled and sent to prison.
